label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_028
content:

### Events
- Emergency compaction surge reduced pending from 152 to 118; scrub errors decreased to 34 and fsync p95 improved to 16.7 ms.
- Completed 16 rebalance jobs, achieving skew index 1.01 and preventing any node from exceeding 99% used.
- Disk failure repaired with 6.6-hour rebuild; verified placement groups clean post-rebuild.
- Snapshot verification had one failure due to verifier disk filling; expanded verifier volume and re-verified successfully.

### On Call
- Shift: Helena D.
- Pages: 8
- Tickets: 15
- Status: Stable but extremely constrained; utilization at 92%.
- Emergency controls remain (write restrictions, onboarding freeze, strict quota policy) until additional capacity is deployed.
